import React,{useState} from 'react' import { signInUserwithEmailAndPassword } from '../utils/firebase' export default function Login(){ const [loginData,setLogin] = useState({ userName:'', password:'' }) const handleChange = (e) =>{ const {id,value} = e.target setLogin(prevState =>{ return{ ...prevState, [id]:value } }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() const currentUser = await signInUserwithEmailAndPassword(loginData.userName, loginData.password); console.log(loginData) console.log(currentUser); } return(
{/* Form data */}
